textTemplates.name: h_363688ccbebb3faddf9df0b1e95f1adc_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY Screen D" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY Screen D" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_Screen_D
Type: Flow
Version: 2
Status: Active
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY Screen D
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
API Version for Running the Flow: 63.0
